title: RHOBH: Hear The Angels' Voices
description:
Erika performs an unplanned duet with Asher on a very merry Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Plus, there's more discussion about drinking, and PK explains what that whole DUI situation is.

This is a Crappens on Demand episode, which means you can watch our recap here: https://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
